First, the C program structure:

#include <stdio.h>
#include <stdlib.h>
#include <string.h>

// Function prototypes
void first_step(int n, long a[], long output[]);
void second_step(const char *input, char *output);
void third_step(const char *input, long *result);

int main() {
    int n;
    scanf("%d", &n);
    long *a = (long *)malloc(n * sizeof(long));
    for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
        scanf("%ld", &a[i]);
    }

    // First step
    long *output_first = (long *)malloc(n * sizeof(long));
    first_step(n, a, output_first);

    // Get the first element's string
    char first_element_str[20]; // enough for long numbers
    snprintf(first_element_str, sizeof(first_element_str), "%ld", output_first[0]);

    // Second step
    char second_result[4]; // "Yes" or "No" plus null
    second_step(first_element_str, second_result);

    // Third step
    long third_result;
    third_step(second_result, &third_result);

    printf("%ld\n", third_result);

    free(a);
    free(output_first);
    return 0;
}

void first_step(int n, long a[], long output[]) {
    long *dp = (long *)malloc((n+1)*sizeof(long));
    for (int i = 0; i <= n; i++) dp[i] = -1;
    dp[n-1] = a[n-1];
    for (int i = n-1; i >=0; i--) {
        if (i < n) { // because dp[i+1] is valid when i <n
            dp[i] = (dp[i+1] > a[i]) ? dp[i+1] : a[i];
        }
    }
    // Compute output array
    for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
        if (a[i] > dp[i+1]) {
            output[i] = 0;
        } else {
            output[i] = dp[i+1] - a[i] +1;
        }
    }
    free(dp);
}

void second_step(const char *input, char *output) {
    int freq[256] = {0};
    int len = strlen(input);
    for (int i = 0; i < len; i++) {
        char c = input[i];
        freq[c]++;
    }
    int distinct = 0;
    int valid = 1;
    for (int i = 0; i < 256; i++) {
        if (freq[i] > 0) {
            distinct++;
            if (freq[i] != 2) {
                valid = 0;
            }
        }
    }
    if (distinct == 2 && valid) {
        strcpy(output, "Yes");
    } else {
        strcpy(output, "No");
    }
}

void third_step(const char *input, long *result) {
    int N = strlen(input);
    int *mod_arr = (int *)malloc(N * sizeof(int));
    int *mod_cnt = (int *)calloc(2019, sizeof(int));
    int radix = 1;
    for (int i = 0; i < N; i++) {
        int pos = N -1 -i;
        char c = input[pos];
        int digit = c - '0';
        int tmp = (digit * radix) % 2019;
        if (i !=0) {
            tmp = (tmp + mod_arr[i-1]) % 2019;
        }
        mod_arr[i] = tmp;
        mod_cnt[tmp]++;
        radix = (radix *10) % 2019;
    }
    mod_cnt[0]++; // as per the Java code
    long ans = 0;
    for (int i = 0; i < 2019; i++) {
        ans += (long)mod_cnt[i] * (mod_cnt[i] -1) / 2;
    }
    *result = ans;
    free(mod_arr);
    free(mod_cnt);
}
